channel.title: [HELP] Error Packet Type 2 [HELP]
channel.description:
Ok, first of let's get some things straight: -Im new, yes woop de do. -Ive searched endlessly for a fix for this..ENDLESSLY! -I AM using Bluur's client, BUT it has been edited and renamed as DDSpeced V3.1 Bug Fix....I DID leach, and will give credits when i am done. -I have Testing new Clients, and worked out that it ISN'T the client BUT the Server.
Ok, from my conclusions its not a Client-side problem it's Server-side, It's either a playerHandling, playerLoading, playerSaving or playerAssitance (My Player.java Files)..This previously happened and i just restarted, but ive done MUCH more since i restarted the server and do not wish to re-start so can someone please take a look at the Source and Client and tell me whats wrong?
Here is an image of the server, Client and java client. [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/5509/12345l.png[/img]
Please comment something more than, "It's Client sided", "Probably Models" or "Try Client.java" and not specify what to look for...
I'll help the person who helps me as much as i can with whatever i can.
Thanks, Milopeach. (New Member)

item.title: [HELP] Error Packet Type 2 [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @milopeach milopeach
item.description:
@milopeach wrote:

Ok, first of let’s get some things straight:
-Im new, yes woop de do.
-Ive searched endlessly for a fix for this…ENDLESSLY!
-I AM using Bluur’s client, BUT it has been edited and renamed as DDSpeced V3.1 Bug Fix…I DID leach, and will give credits when i am done.
-I have Testing new Clients, and worked out that it ISN’T the client BUT the Server.

Ok, from my conclusions its not a Client-side problem it’s Server-side, It’s either a playerHandling, playerLoading, playerSaving or playerAssitance (My Player.java Files)…This previously happened and i just restarted, but ive done MUCH more since i restarted the server and do not wish to re-start so can someone please take a look at the Source and Client and tell me whats wrong?

Here is an image of the server, Client and java client.

Please comment something more than, “It’s Client sided”, “Probably Models” or “Try Client.java” and not specify what to look for…

I’ll help the person who helps me as much as i can with whatever i can.

Thanks,
Milopeach. (New Member)
